frames.input

Interface Grabber

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GrabberObject, Node, Shape

    public interface Grabber
    Grabbers are means to attach a user-space object to all the Agents (see Agent.addGrabber(Grabber)) through which it's going to be handled. For details, refer to the Agent documentation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void interact(Event event)
      Defines how the grabber should react according to the given event.
      boolean track(Event event)
      Defines the rules to set the grabber as an agent inputGrabber-grabber.

    • Method Detail

      • track

        boolean track(Event event)
        Defines the rules to set the grabber as an agent inputGrabber-grabber.
        See Also:
        Agent.poll(Event), Agent.inputGrabber()

      • interact

        void interact(Event event)
        Defines how the grabber should react according to the given event.
        See Also:
        Agent.handle(Event)
